description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国安徽省淮南市的一家广播电视播出机构，也是中共淮南市委、淮南市人民政府的喉舌。
description.en: A radio and television broadcasting organization in Huainan City, Anhui Province, People's Republic of China. It also serves as the mouthpiece of the CPC Huainan Municipal Committee and the Huainan Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省级行政区。
description.en: A province of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国安徽省下辖的地级市。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Anhui Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国安徽省淮南市下辖的市辖区。
description.en: A district under the jurisdiction of Huainan City, Anhui Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在淮南市的地方组织。
description.en: The local organization of the Communist Party of China in Huainan City.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国淮南市的地方国家行政机关。
description.en: The local state administrative organ of Huainan City, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 淮南市广播电视台的前身之一，前身为淮南煤矿职工广播电台。
description.en: One of the predecessors of Huainan Radio and Television Station, formerly known as Huainan Coal Mine Workers' Radio Station.

description.zh-cn: 淮南市广播电视台的前身之一。
description.en: One of the predecessors of Huainan Radio and Television Station.

nodes.id: 淮南煤矿职工广播电台

zh-cn: 淮南煤矿职工广播电台

description.zh-cn: 淮南人民广播电台的前身。
description.en: The predecessor of Huainan People's Radio Station.

nodes.id: 中央新闻总署广播事业局

zh-cn: 中央新闻总署广播事业局

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国建国初期的广播事业主管机构。
description.en: The regulatory body for broadcasting in the early days of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 安徽省的省级广播电台。
description.en: The provincial radio station of Anhui Province.

description.zh-cn: 安徽省在1955年至1967年间的省级国家行政机关。
description.en: The provincial state administrative organ of Anhui Province from 1955 to 1967.

description.zh-cn: 淮南市广播电视台是中共淮南市委的喉舌。
description.en: Huainan Radio and Television Station is the mouthpiece of the CPC Huainan Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 淮南市广播电视台是淮南市人民政府的喉舌。
description.en: Huainan Radio and Television Station is the mouthpiece of the Huainan Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 与淮南电视台合并成立淮南市广播电视台。
description.en: Merged with Huainan Television Station to establish Huainan Radio and Television Station.

description.zh-cn: 与淮南人民广播电台合并成立淮南市广播电视台。
description.en: Merged with Huainan People's Radio Station to establish Huainan Radio and Television Station.

relationships.source: 淮南煤矿职工广播电台

description.zh-cn: 淮南煤矿职工广播电台于1951年4月10日改名为淮南人民广播电台。
description.en: Huainan Coal Mine Workers' Radio Station was renamed Huainan People's Radio Station on April 10, 1951.

relationships.source: 中央新闻总署广播事业局
relationships.target: 淮南煤矿职工广播电台

description.zh-cn: 批准淮南煤矿职工广播电台于1950年5月1日正式开播。
description.en: Approved the official launch of Huainan Coal Mine Workers' Radio Station on May 1, 1950.

description.zh-cn: 安徽人民广播电台于1952年6月1日开播后，淮南人民广播电台于1953年6月19日奉命停播。
description.en: After Anhui People's Radio Station began broadcasting on June 1, 1952, Huainan People's Radio Station was ordered to cease broadcasting on June 19, 1953.

description.zh-cn: 决定于1964年7月28日关闭淮南人民广播电台。
description.en: Decided to close Huainan People's Radio Station on July 28, 1964.
